dcterms:description: The public low/normal-dose dataset released from the 2016 NIH-AAPM-Mayo Clinic Low Dose CT Grand Challenge includes 10 patientsâ€™ abdominal examinations obtained on similar scanner models. The normal-dose CT images are acquired under the settings of 120kV, 50mAs, while the low-dose counterparts are simulated to reach a noise level corresponding to 25% by inserting Poisson noise.
dcterms:title: NIH-AAPM-Mayo Clinic Low Dose CT Grand Challenge

dcterms:creator: C. Lischer
U. Walliser
P. Witzmann
M. W. Eser
S. Ohlerth
dcterms:description: The LDCT-PD dataset includes 99 non-contrast head CT scans, 100 low-dose non-contrast chest scans, and 100 contrast-enhanced CT scans of the abdomen, acquired for patients with acute cognitive or motor deficits, and for screening high-risk patients for pulmonary nodules.
dcterms:title: LDCT-PD dataset
